Presenting main takeaways of new book "Sustaining Economic Growth in Asia," the IMF and @PIIE  economists said today that #EconomicIntegration within the region should become a main driver of growth in a new Asian growth model. #IMFAsia https://t.co/Uhdu4v3JRu
